entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 8:32 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of snow near noon. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:32 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
